name: SWEETS (Kathitow)
description:
A strange game to entertain and distract the mind for a while, ideal to send it to a friend. especially if it's his birthday.

do not judge me!!!!
I am happy and I did it to bring happiness to others

I have other games, unfortunately they could not come to light at this time; but '' sweets '' has a bit of one of them.
I really enjoy doing it, I hope you enjoy playing it
